name: USLab Specimen Body Site
publisher: Published by:  HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup
description: USLab Specimen Body Site: Codes to describe the specimen collection body site. This value set includes all SNOMED CT concepts that are descendents of Anatomical Structure (91723000)
